channel.title: 725 Help
channel.description: Today I upgraded my 667 cache to 725(I think :P Im a noob to anything but 317) but I'm having 2 problems. One is when I spawn the royal crossbow and other relatively new items they have no bonuses. I have used the runewiki bonus dumper and there are still do bonuses. Also some items such as the assassin outfit dont fit my character. Also how can i make it so i can customize the assassin outfit like my completionist cape. Im not very worried about that right now.

item.title: 725 Help
item.dc:creator: @Eaffon Eaffon
item.description:
@Eaffon wrote:

AtomicInt_:

I’m not sure, never worked with your revision server. But I’d assume something along the lines of ‘ItemDefinitions’

Thank you so much
I would rep if I could I found itemdefinitions, but I have no clue what to modify…

Read full topic

item.title: 725 Help
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

I’m not sure, never worked with your revision server. But I’d assume something along the lines of ‘ItemDefinitions’

Read full topic

item.title: 725 Help
item.dc:creator: @Eaffon Eaffon
item.description:
@Eaffon wrote:

AtomicInt_:

You need to expand the capacity of allowed item definitions.

Thank you, where would I do that? sorry Im a noob

Read full topic

@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

You need to expand the capacity of allowed item definitions.

Read full topic

item.title: 725 Help
item.dc:creator: @Eaffon Eaffon
item.description:
@Eaffon wrote:

Guys thanks for trying, but none of that has worked… theres nowhere to add ids in itemdefs. I believe youre thinking of a 317. Also how do i make it so assassin outfit fits my char correctly?

Read full topic

item.title: 725 Help
item.dc:creator: @doritos_own doritos own
item.description:
@doritos_own wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:4, topic:450967”][quote author=doritos own link=topic=553847.msg4057375#msg4057375 date=1343098095]

add me on skype:

soda432

Don’t add this guy on skype. Someone claimed he is a scammer.

Find your item definitions file and add the item ids and put the bonuses in too.

are you fucking retarded…they deleted it afterwards. I kept him waiting cause i was busy doing something and he thought i scammed him…notice that its deleted now?
[/quote]
No because i didn’t go back to that thread.

Why not just post on the thread?[/quote]

cause its easier helping though TV or talking to the person and explaining it…

Read full topic
